name: Cube-8 beta
description: You take control over a ball. Your mission is to get 8 cubes like the name says. But it is not easy to make this, because you'll have to get passed through many obstacles. You also can customize your ball. This is the beta version, that means that it is not the final one, we are constantly adding new features. So do not lose any update and keep watching the news about this game.
